author: tink
msg: Fixed bug where the targets horizontal or vertical scrollPosition is set to NaN if set before there layout has updateDisplayList invoked and an unscaledWidth/unscaledHeight set. This prevented the incrementButton/decrementButton working until the track or thumb was used changing the selectedIndex.
